properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_NO , POST_TITLE , UPDATE_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , COMM_NO , LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_REPLY WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT REPLY_NO , R.USER_NO "USER_NO" , C.COMM_POST_NO "COMM_POST_NO" , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_CATEGORY , R.UPDATE_DATE "UPDATE_DATE" , C.POST_TITLE "POST_TITLE" FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_REPLY R ON(R.COMM_POST_NO = C.COMM_POST_NO) WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY R.UPDATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BK_POST_TYPE = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT H.HT_POST_NO "HT_POST_NO" , HT_POST_TITLE , CATEGORY_NAME , HT_UPDATE_DATE , HT_LIKE_COUNT , FILE_PATH || FILE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM TB_HOMETRAINING H JOIN TB_BOOKMARK B ON(H.HT_POST_NO = B.BK_POST_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND B.USER_NO = ? AND BK_POST_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BK_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BK_POST_TYPE = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT I.INT_POST_NO "INT_POST_NO" , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_TITLE , LIKE_COUNT , I.UPDATE_DATE "FILE_UPDATE" , FILE_PATH || FILE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM TB_INFO_N_TIP I JOIN TB_INT_FILE F ON (I.INT_POST_NO = F.INT_POST_NO) JOIN TB_BOOKMARK B ON(I.INT_POST_NO = B.BK_POST_NO) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.USER_NO = ? AND BK_POST_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY BK_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
